title: Personal Portfolio
description: This is the website you are viewing at the moment! This website was created using VUE and was a way for me to learn a front end framework, as well as creating a way to showcase my porfolio. Concepts such as using components, Javascript scripts, displaying data from JSON files used.

title: EduBot
description: EduBot is a discord bot created for ruHacks 2021. The bot is designed to help students stay organized through a common platform. The bot allows you to keep track of your schedule and notify you when of important class and date times. Concepts like event handlers and listeners, and apsheduler was used.

title: Arcade Games
description: This is a collection of quick games made using VUE Js

title: Task Master
description: Used node.js and express to develop a simple real-time task list that allows user to store 10+ reminders, GET and POST methods used to collect form data and allow users to delete and add tasks
